mapper.sql: a.article_id, a.title, a.content, a.price, a.images, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.user_id, a.type_id, a.`status`, a.`condition`
mapper.select:
SELECT ua.FAVORITE_AMOUNT,
FROM article a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT ua2.* FROM user_article ua1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT article_id, count(*) AS FAVORITE_AMOUNT FROM user_article where favorite = 1 GROUP BY article_id ) ua2 ON ua1.article_id = ua2.article_id ) ua ON ua.article_id = a.article_id LEFT JOIN type t ON a.type_id = t.id WHERE a.`STATUS` = '1' AND a.`CONDITION` = '1' and a.type_id = #{typeId} and instr(a.`title`, "${titleAndContent}") > 0 or instr(a.`content`, "${titleAndContent}") > 0
mapper.insert: insert into cdc.article(create_time, update_time, title, content, price, images, user_id, type_id, `status`, `condition`) values (#{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{title}, #{content}, #{price}, #{images}, #{userId}, #{typeId}, 1, #{condition})
mapper.delete: delete from user_article where user_id = #{userId} AND article_id =#{articleId}
mapper.select: select a.price,a.article_id, a.title, a.images,u.nickname as pulisher,a.create_time,a.user_id from user_article au left join article a on au.article_id = a.article_id left join user u on a.user_id = u.user_id where au.user_id = #{userId} and au.favorite = 1 and a.`condition` = 1 GROUP BY a.article_id

select article_id, title, content, images, create_time, update_time, user_id, status,price,t.name as typeName from cdc.article a left join `type` t on a.type_id = t.id where article_id = #{articleId} AND `condition` = 1
mapper.update:

title = #{title},
content = #{content},

create_time = #{createTime},

user_id = #{userId},
